com.delphix.masking.api.plugin

Interface MaskingComponent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JsonConfigurable, PluginComponent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MaskingAlgorithm<T>

    public interface MaskingComponent
extends PluginComponent, JsonConfigurable
    This is the interface is encompasses the notions of:

    . A Json configurable plugin component

    . Automatic default instance creation

    . The ability to prohibit additional instances from being created

    This interface is only used for masking algorithms. It allows a zero-configuration mapplet like experience when a plugin is installed. Embedded instance definitions have proven to add significant implementation complexity, so this interface should not be used for future types of extensibility.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static char IDENTIFIER_SCOPING_SEPARATOR
      The separator used to create fully scoped names of components, as pluginName + separator + componentName.

      default boolean getAllowFurtherInstances()
      Returns true if additional instances of this component may be created beyond those enumerated by getDefaultInstances().

      Return a collection of objects that describe the default set of instances that should be created for this component at plugin installation time.

      Prepare this object for use.

    • Field Detail

      • IDENTIFIER_SCOPING_SEPARATOR

        static final char IDENTIFIER_SCOPING_SEPARATOR
        The separator used to create fully scoped names of components, as pluginName + separator + componentName. The values returned by component's getName methods should never contain this character.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultInstances

        default java.util.Collection<MaskingComponent> getDefaultInstances()
        Return a collection of objects that describe the default set of instances that should be created for this component at plugin installation time. Additional instances may be created later as long as getAllowFurtherInstances() returns true.
        Returns:
        A collection of objects that are the instances of this component to be created.

      • getAllowFurtherInstances

        default boolean getAllowFurtherInstances()
        Returns true if additional instances of this component may be created beyond those enumerated by getDefaultInstances(). Components for which this method returns true and that implement a MaskingAlgorithm interface are treated as Algorithm Frameworks by the masking engine.
        Returns:
        The boolean value indicating whether additional instances may be created

      • setup

        default void setup(@Nonnull
                   ComponentService serviceProvider)
        Prepare this object for use. This includes acquiring any required external resources, such as files or other components, using the passed serviceProvider. The component object's JSON configuration is always injected before this method is called.
        While the serviceProvider object is guaranteed to remain valid fof the life of this component, some methods accessed through the serviceProvider may only be invoked during setup. Please consult the documentation for the ComponentService provider interface for details.
        Parameters:
        serviceProvider - The service provider object

      • tearDown

        default void tearDown()
        Relinquish any resources this algorithm has acquired during its operation. Typically, this means closing all network or database connections initiated by the algorithm. It is not necessary to close any resources acquired through the ComponentService provider. This is also a convenient opportunity to log any final details about the activity of the algorithm.
